creator: jnandal@hotmail.com
text:
Server version: Apache Tomcat/7.0.26       
Server built:   Feb 17 2012 02:11:27       
Server number:  7.0.26.0                   
OS Name:        OS/400                     
OS Version:     V6R1M0                     
Architecture:   PowerPC                    
JVM Version:    1.6.0_11-b03               
JVM Vendor:     IBM Corporation            

Trying to install a brand new tomcat 7.0.26 (same error with 7.0.25)and it fails to start.  This is without any of my own war files, this is only tomcat's zip file.

Attached is the Catalina log:
